content.text: Match ends, Ponferradina 3, Mallorca 1.
Second Half ends, Ponferradina 3, Mallorca 1.
Filip Markovic (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Javier Carpio (Ponferradina).
Attempt saved. Rubén Sobrino (Ponferradina) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Tete.
Abdón Prats (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lucas Domínguez (Ponferradina).
Corner,  Ponferradina. Conceded by Pau Cendrós.

Foul by Abdón Prats (Mallorca).

Goal!  Ponferradina 3, Mallorca 1. Álex Vallejo (Mallorca) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the centre of the goal following a set piece situation.
Attempt blocked. Fofo (Mallorca) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Lucas Domínguez (Ponferradina) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Hand ball by Lucas Domínguez (Ponferradina).
Substitution, Ponferradina. Tete replaces Jesús Berrocal.
Attempt missed. Fofo (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Álex Vallejo.
Rubén Sobrino (Ponferradina) hits the bar with a header from the centre of the box. Assisted by Acorán with a cross.
Substitution, Ponferradina. Rubén Sobrino replaces Yuri.
Attempt missed. Jesús Berrocal (Ponferradina) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.

Substitution, Ponferradina. Mario Paglialunga replaces Adán Gurdiel.
Goal!  Ponferradina 3, Mallorca 0. Yuri (Ponferradina) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
